content: Explain the meaning of the idiom "give the cold shoulder".

The idiom "give the cold shoulder" means to deliberately ignore someone or treat them in an unfriendly or distant manner. It often implies a lack of warmth, affection, or interest towards the person, and is usually a sign of disapproval or displeasure. The origin of this phrase is believed to come from the literal act of serving a cold shoulder of meat to an unwanted guest, symbolizing a lack of hospitality.
